tool_description: Maps dates to religious observances, holy days, and liturgical readings across multiple faith traditions.

date.description: Date to check for religious observances

calendar_type.description: Calendar system: gregorian, lunar, or traditional

error_messages: Invalid date format: Provide date in valid ISO 8601 format.
Unsupported traditions: One or more traditions are not recognized.
Invalid calendar type: Use gregorian, lunar, or traditional.
usage: Provide date and traditions array; optionally specify calendar_type. Returns religious observances and associated readings for the specified date.

observances.description: Religious observances occurring on this date

liturgical_readings.description: Prescribed scripture readings for the day

traditions_with_events.description: Traditions that have observances on this date
